CustomField.description: Traffic control plan plus extra spaces for print format(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Vehicle/equipment parked to protect work area'), 'Vehicle/equipment parked to protect work area' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Lane Closure'), 'Lane Closure' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Traffic Control Signs'), 'Traffic Control Signs' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Cones/movable barricades'), 'Cones/movable barricades' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Immovable barriers/barricades'), 'Immovable barriers/barricades' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Flaggers/Police detail'), 'Flaggers/Police detail' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Public sidewalk closure/pedestrian detour'), 'Public sidewalk closure/pedestrian detour' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Traffic_Control_Plan_Includes__c, 'Other'), 'Other', null)
CustomField.label: Traffic Control Plan Includes Long
